entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then northeast 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
